title: Selective fluorescent labeling of cellular proteins and its biological applications
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00094C, Review Article
Joo Hee Choi, Sooin Kim, On-Yu Kang, Seong Yun Choi, Ji Young Hyun, Hyun Soo Lee, Injae Shin
We discuss recent advances in the fluorescent labeling of specific proteins in cells and its applications for studying protein-associated biological processes.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
